Total duration of examination is defined on the exam panel for %1$s. All the questions are mandatory. You need to answer all the questions in order to proceed. The clock will be set at the server. The countdown timer in the top right corner of screen will display the remaining time available for you to complete the examination. The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols: If candidate did not answer the Question, it will be consider as Not Answered and the Exam will not be submitted. There will be no negative marking. To answer a question, do the following: Click on the question number in the Question Palette at the right of your screen to go to that numbered question directly. Note that using this option does NOT save your answer to the current question. Click on Mark for Review to mark any question for review. Procedure for answering a multiple choice type question: To select your answer, click on the button of one of the options. Click Skip, Previous or Next to move between questions. Don\'t quit the application in between exam else the exam will not be submitted.
• A certification program under PMKVY to provide recognition to the informal learning or learning through work to get equal acceptance as the formal levels of education.
• It aims to appreciate prior learning irrespective of the medium of achieving it. In short, RPL is a process of assessment of an individual’s prior learning to give due importance to learning as an outcome rather than learning as process.
Benefits Under RPL 4.0 – BICE Benefits to Employee :- 1)No fee charged for assessment and certification 2)Successfully certified candidates shall receive a pay-out of Rs 500 3) 3 year accidental insurance INR 2 Lakhs free of cost 4) Skill certificate can be further used for taking up next level of job role in the respective skill sector First Name*

//Changes by pjha 1) Candidates will be provided Skill Certificate and Mark sheet to the candidate. If the mobile number of the candidate is recorded, the PIA should notify them of the aforementioned details via SMS. 2) Candidates will be provided with Pay-Out 500\u20B9 based on their eligibility. The Pay-Out will be directly deposited to candidate’s registered bank account that is linked with Aadhar. So ensure to provide aadhar linked bank details on registration form upon enrolment. 3) All RPL certified candidates shall receive accidental insurance of three years from New India Assurance Company Limited. The insurance money for the candidates shall be deducted from the PIA Pay-Out. A unique policy number of the Accidental Insurance is mentioned on the certificate that is to be awarded to respective certified candidates Benefits Under RPL-1 For Employee: Benefits Under RPL-2 For Employee: Benefits Under RPL-3 For Employee: * Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) is an initiative of the Government of India (GoI), Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE) under Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY), implemented by the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC).
Primarily Objectives of RPL-1: Primarily Objectives of RPL-2: Primarily Objectives of RPL-3:
• To align the competencies of the pre existing workforce of the country to the standardized National Skills Qualification Framework (NSQF) • To enhance the employability and/or entrepreneurial opportunities of an individual • To provide opportunities for reducing inequalities based on privileging certain forms of knowledge over others.

1 Duration of the test will be 50 mins. 2 All questions are compulsory. 3 The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols:
3.1 You have marked the answer for review.
3.2 You have saved the answer. 3.3 You have not attempted the question 4 Multiple selection of answers is not allowed i.e. all questions have 1 correct answer.
5 Click on Save &nbps Next to save your answer for the current question and then it will go to the next question.
6 Students must complete the 25-question multiple-choice exam within the 50-minute time frame allotted for the exam.
7 Don\'t close the app and don\'t go out in between the assessment.
For Any Query Please Contact Us 8929486900/8929486904/7303099344/7303507547

◦The objective of the assessment was clear to you. ◦The assessor was supportive and helped wherever possible. ◦The language and content of the assessment was easy to understand. ◦ Was stipulated time provided for assessment. ◦Were required tools and equipment available at the centre ◦ Feel free to add any other comments or suggestions: Type here
Describe your problem add screenshot (optional) Next Please enter the OTP received on %1$s. OTP must contain at least 6 digits
/Amar/ Choose App Language Fill the details to Login Log in Account Don\'t have an account? <font color="%1$s"><b> Register</b></font> Mark your attendance one the next page and kindly follow the instructions to start the assessment First Name : Question No Thanks /18/01/21/ Already registered? Sign In With Google Enter Email Id Enter Mobile Number Enter Full Name Fill The Details Submit Or <font color="%1$s"><b> Please Login</b></font> verify & proceed Didn\'t receive OTP? <b><font color=#FF0000> Resend</font></b> Assessor Name* /Amar/ Free Test Video Call Help and support Become an assessor Register for Exam Change language Terms of Services & privacy Device Location It is mandatory for candidates to share the access of their location to mark the attendance digitally for online assessment. We understand the sensitivity of this topic and we do not share user data with anyone. Storage Permission A candidate must share the access of their device storage to appear in online assessment. We require storage permission to capture candidate activity throughout the assessment and to mark their attendance. After assessment completion, we delete the captured images automatically. We do not delete user personal data. Camera Permission Candidates must share the camera access of their device. Through this accessibility, we validate candidate identity for attendance, detect other faces present during the assessment, and capture images with a live webcam to maintain exam integrity. Network Connection Information A candidate must share their device network connectivity as we require the same to run hassle-free assessment during network interruption. Our application manages network connectivity for two modes of assessment i.e., offline and online so we do require the user network permission to conduct the assessment smoothly. Microphone Permission It is mandatory for candidates to share access to their microphones. With the microphone permission, we record the audio throughout the assessment to ensure a cheat-proof environment. Phone Permission A candidate must share the access of their phone while appearing in the assessment in case the user needs to call the helpline number so we can connect them immediately. I agree App Permissions Note- We do not share user or candidate data with anyone.

Guidelines \n दिशा-निर्देश
1.The candidate needs to keep the front camera/webcam on throughout the assessment. \n उम्मीदवार को पूरे मूल्यांकन में फ्रंट कैमरा / वेब कैमरा रखने की आवश्यकता है। \n
2.The candidate must make sure that she/he is appearing for the assessments in an environment where there is least disturbance, intrusion, or interference by any members of the family/friends or any other third entity other than the authorized representative of Assessment Agency 8929486900(Sarvesh rai) or 7303099344(Vikul Bhatnagar).\n उम्मीदवार को यह सुनिश्चित करना होगा कि वह उस वातावरण में आकलन के लिए उपस्थित हो रहा है, जहां परिवार के किसी भी सदस्य / मित्र या किसी अन्य तीसरी संस्था द्वारा कम से कम गड़बड़ी, घुसपैठ या हस्तक्षेप हो, जो आकलन एजेंसी के अधिकृत प्रतिनिधि के अलावा अन्य किसी अन्य संस्था से हो 8929486900 (सर्वेश राय) या 7303099344 (विकुल भटनागर)। \n
3.After starting the assessment if the candidate moves out of the camera and test window/ assessment page (web or app) more than 30 times, the login will be blocked and for that specific candidate assessment would stand as completed. \n मूल्यांकन शुरू करने के बाद यदि उम्मीदवार कैमरा और परीक्षण विंडो / मूल्यांकन पृष्ठ (वेब ​​या ऐप) से 30 बार से अधिक चलता है, तो लॉगिन अवरुद्ध हो जाएगा और इसके लिए विशिष्ट उम्मीदवार मूल्यांकन "पूर्ण" के रूप में खड़ा होगा। \n
4.Since there is continuous face detection done during the test, there should not be any object covering the candidate’s face (which intends to hide the candidate’s identity) during the assessment, else, login will be blocked after 30 warnings.\nचूंकि परीक्षण के दौरान लगातार चेहरे का पता लगाया जाता है, इसलिए मूल्यांकन के दौरान उम्मीदवार के चेहरे को कवर करने वाली कोई वस्तु नहीं होनी चाहिए (जो उम्मीदवार की पहचान छिपाने का इरादा रखता है), अन्यथा, 30 चेतावनियों के बाद लॉगिन अवरुद्ध हो जाएगा। \n
5.Candidates should give the assessment at that location in a brightly lit room as the candidate\'s face needs to be visible. \n उम्मीदवारों को उस स्थान पर एक उज्ज्वल रोशनी वाले कमरे में मूल्यांकन देना चाहिए क्योंकि उम्मीदवार के चेहरे को दिखाई देने की आवश्यकता है। \n
6.Use of earphones/Mobile phones shall not be permitted during the assessment.\n मूल्यांकन के दौरान इयरफ़ोन / मोबाइल फोन के उपयोग की अनुमति नहीं दी जाएगी। \n
7.Internet connection Minimum Download Speed of 0.768 Mbps, although 1.5 Mbps is recommended & Minimum Upload Speed of 0.384 Mbps, although 1 Mbps is recommended. \n इंटरनेट कनेक्शन न्यूनतम डाउनलोड गति 0.768 एमबीपीएस है, हालांकि 1.5 एमबीपीएस की सिफारिश की गई है और न्यूनतम अपलोड गति 0.384 एमबीपीएस है, हालांकि 1 एमबीपीएस की सिफारिश की गई है। \n
8.Internet connection Minimum Download Speed of 0.768 Mbps, although 1.5 Mbps is recommended & Minimum Upload Speed of 0.384 Mbps, although 1 Mbps is recommended. \n उम्मीदवारों को साझा टेस्ट लिंक खोलना होगा या प्ले स्टोर से टेस्टा ऐप (एंड्रॉइड एप्लिकेशन) डाउनलोड करना होगा \n
9.For taking the test, recommended browsers are Google Chrome(Ver. 75 or above), Mozilla Firefox(Ver. 70 or above) and Android 6+ above devices for Android Application (Testa). \n परीक्षण करने के लिए, अनुशंसित ब्राउज़र Google Chrome (Ver। 75 या इसके बाद के संस्करण), मोज़िला फ़ायरफ़ॉक्स (Ver। 70 या इसके बाद के संस्करण) और Android 6+ Android उपकरणों के लिए ऊपर (Testa) हैं। \n
OK I Understand \n
//Change Amar 26/04/2021 About RPL-5.0 (Online RPL) • Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) is an initiative of the Government of India (GoI), Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE) under Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY), implemented by the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC). The scheme focuses on engaging individuals of unregulated sectors. • It is open to all those who want certification. It is limited to specific job roles where theory, and practical are evaluated online. It allows an individual to take an exam from their location, which saves time, energy and other human resources.
Benefits Under RPL-5.0- (Online RPL for employee) 1)No fee for assessment and certification 2)Open for all the skill seekers 3)Can give the exam from any location in India 4)Successfully certified candidates shall receive a pay-out of ₹ 500 5)3-year accidental insurance INR 2 Lakhs free of cost 6)Cost-effective method 7)Furthermore, the skill certificate helps individuals in taking up the next level of job role in the respective skill sector.
